featured.text: For example, a 1798 dime is much rarer than a 1916 dime, but the 25 sells for significantly more, simply because many more people collect early 20th century dimes than dimes from the 1700s.

other.text: He later created a standard of measuring children’s intelligence 28 the data he had collected from the French children he studied.

definition.zh_def: 收集，聚集或獲得某物的行為。
definition.en_def: To gather together or accumulate items or information.
definition.example: She loves to collect stamps from different countries.
